function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Suspension of recycling practices during a pandemic","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased water consumption and lack of sustainable water use during pandemics","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased household energy consumption due to remote work and lockdowns","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased medical waste from single-use masks and gloves","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of access to private outdoor space for people suffering from lung diseases, leading to potential health decline.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Increased consumption of resources in homes during extended lockdowns, leading to environmental impacts and resource strain.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Elevated ozone pollution and changes in nox concentrations in cities, impacting air quality and health.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited capacity to prevent virus transmission","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of self-sufficiency for extended periods of isolation","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased domestic violence due to lockdowns","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of personal space and outdoor space complicating occupants’ lives and leading to health problems, including mental health.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unavailability of icts leading to deficient use of necessary services, such as medical consultation and food/medicines delivery.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Sudden drop in economic activity during lockdowns making it difficult for several population classes to pay for increasing housing costs.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of independent local stores and pharmacies leading to a crisis during lockdowns due to insufficient reserves in food and medicines.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate protection from infections inside housing leading to increased risk of disease outbreak.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Isolation of residential complexes due to infected inhabitants, leading to the spread of infections among occupants.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Limited capacity to protect occupants from virus transmission through surfaces and by air in existing residential buildings.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of service or facility to assist victims of domestic violence in existing residential buildings.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of increased energy usage and the need for sustainable energy sources due to global lockdowns.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Rapidly growing literature on covid-19","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inadequate data collection and review process","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on residential building design","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Introduction of touchless technologies and antimicrobial materials","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Better solid-waste management","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Social distancing within the house","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lightweight architecture and flexible building design","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased risk of viral transmission in densely populated buildings due to lack of ventilation and proximity","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate sanitation and hygiene measures leading to contamination and disease transmission","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High density of people in buildings leading to elevated risk of prolonged self-isolation and mental health issues","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Increased urbanization despite the advice to expand horizontally and decrease densities may lead to higher risk of disease spread in crowded areas.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of emphasis on walkable and cyclable urban environments may lead to continued reliance on cars, increasing pollution and health risks.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate planning for emergency facility requirements and medical infrastructure may result in insufficient response to future outbreaks.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Contagious disease propagation in the built environment","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Environmental impact of disease mitigation measures","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact on comfort of people spending most of their time at home","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Deposition of virus on surfaces after contact with infected person or via turbulent flow","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Forced confinement at home leading to increased risk of viral spread","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Closure of public spaces and suspension of activities","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Zoonotic disease outbreaks from animal origins","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Link between zoonotic diseases and climate change & land usage","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Close proximity of human, domestic, and wild animal habitats leading to virus mixing and propagation","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lockdown measures confining people to their houses for long periods of time","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of green building certification systems covering pandemic-resilient indicators","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need for pandemic-resilient residential buildings","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of local services and amenities","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on external food supply","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of contagious diseases in high-density areas","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Low room to member ratio","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate noise insulation and acoustics","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited availability of self-dependent services","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
